title: Here's how to delete the alpha client!
body: Go to your league of legends install folder fx. (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and search for "Alpha" a file called "uninstall client alpha" this will remove the alpha client from your system so you don't have to go back to the legacy client everytime you open the game! :)

replies.body:
Actually, due to how the League Client works, trying to uninstall the client update in this way can break a lot of things. I'd recommend the steps below to launch directly into the Legacy Client if you'd like to avoid using the Beta Client:

> * Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
* Open user.cfg with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
* Save and launch League of Legends again
